Trade/Device Name(s): GlucoLeader Enhance Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GlucoLeader Enhance Blood Glucose Monitoring System using amperometric biosensor for quantitative glucose measurement in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip for self-testing by people with diabetes at home as an aid to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control; not for diagnosis or screening for diabetes and not for use in neonates.
